title: New Apartment near University Of Kelaniaya
details:
Very new, modern and spacious upstairs 3br, 02bath Apartment offers peaceful and quite space to live. Situated just behind the University of Kelaniya giving you the best location while providing the maximum security and ample of car parking. Very close to main road and all the known supermarkets. Looking for a caring and clean tenants.

Celing Fan
Nice big Kitchen
Water Output for hotwatwer
SLT and Peo tv Ready
Has a tube well and a pump too
5min Walking to Kandy Road
10min drive to Negombo Road
Plenty of places to food takeaway.
